subject: The world bank has transferred
body:
The world bank has transferred your total fund of 15.5 million USD via
western union since 03/27/2023 and we have not heard from you to pick
up your first payment of $4,500 dollars from western union office
Kindly Contact Cheryl Golden from western union to pick up your first
payment of $4,500 USD
Email, 
kumardasliton97@gmail.com
HON. Liton Kumar das

subject: Re: The world bank has transferred
body:
Dear Hon. Liton Kumar Das,

Thank you for your message. However, I believe there may be a misunderstanding as I have not been expecting any funds from the World Bank. Could you please provide more details about this transaction?

Best wishes,
Mary
